FuncDef:
The state-refresh-rate-limit command configures the time that a Router has to wait before receiving the next State-Refresh message.
The undo state-refresh-rate-limit restores the default setting. The state-refresh-rate-limit command configures the time that a Router has to wait before receiving the next State-Refresh message. The undo state-refresh-rate-limit restores the default setting. By default, a Router has to wait 30s before receiving the next State-Refresh message.
ParentView: PIM view of a public network instance

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the time that a router has to wait before receiving the next State-Refresh message.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 65535, in seconds. The default value is recommended.
